Package org.opensocial.client

Class Summary
OpenSocialBatch An object representing a collection of OpenSocial requests.
OpenSocialClient An object which provides methods for indirectly interacting with the OpenSocial RESTful and/or JSON-RPC APIs exposed by a container.
OpenSocialOAuthClient A utility object containing various static methods for dealing with OAuth in the context of OpenSocial.
OpenSocialRequest An object which represents a single OpenSocial REST/JSON-RPC request, which are collected and submitted using one or more OpenSocialBatch instances.
OpenSocialRequestParameter An object which represents an OpenSocial data request parameter.
OpenSocialRequestValidator A utility object containing static methods for verifying the signature of requests signed by OpenSocial containers.
OpenSocialResponse An object which represents the response from an OpenSocial container after one or more requests for data.
Token  
 

Enum Summary
OpenSocialClient.Property Enumeration of OpenSocialClient properties that can be set by app
OpenSocialProvider Lists all known OpenSocial providers and their OAuth endpoints.
 

Exception Summary
OpenSocialRequestException A generic exception to be thrown when an unexpected or otherwise erroneous event, condition, or server response occurs while or after issuing a RESTful or JSON-RPC request to a container.
